name: Checking log files - Check linux logs

screenshots.caption: Log File Check - Alert on Logs

short_description:
Checking log files in unix/linux or any unix os is important.  When checking log files, users can choose to generate alert notifications on the log files that are being checked. Or, create graphs for them.  Log files contain vital information which helps identify issues quickly and also avert downtime.

Checking log files can be used for more than just alerting.  With the right tool, users can check log files automatically and predict impending system problems, application issues and database disasters. 

When attempting to check log files on multiple different nodes, many users often end up wasting money on products that are simply overkill and require costly support just to maintain.  logrobot makes checking log files very easy.  There are no complicated instructions for you to read up on.  We make monitoring log files very easy, so easy, no other tool can compare.  

LoGrobot addresses the day to day granular needs of monitoring engineers, developers and system administrators
summary: Checking log files - Check Linux Logs and Unix logs / Alert & Graph
